name: RunToTheHill
description:
"Run to the hill" is endeless run cooperative game. The players drive cars. The first player must take various items to build a weapon. The second player must take the weapon and shoot to the hurdles for clear the road.

The controlls for player 1 are the keys A, S and D.

The controlls for player 2 are the keys left arrow, up arrow and right arrow.
